meaningMnemonic: You know how 参加 is <kanji>participation</kanji>? Well, make that a verb with する and you have yourself <vocabulary>to participate</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Will also help to know the reading of 参加.
